title: How to unsubscribe from History by Mail
description: Learn how to cancel your History by Mail subscription. This guide provides steps to manage your subscription and avoid future charges.

web.title: Cancel Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your History by Mail subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the History by Mail website.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to your account settings or subscription management section.
*   Find the option to cancel your subscription.
*   Follow the prompts to confirm your cancellation.
*   Check for a confirmation email to ensure your subscription has been successfully cancelled.
*   Contact customer support if you encounter any issues during the cancellation process.

support.title: Contact Customer Support
support.description: If you encounter any issues during the cancellation process using the website, contact customer support for assistance.

seo_text: Cancel History by Mail subscription, stop History by Mail payments, History by Mail cancellation guide, unsubscribe from History by Mail, manage History by Mail subscription.
